MessageTemplateMap:
Value is required
Must be a future date
Must be a historical date
Must be an email address (contain the @ symbol)
Less than the minimum value of {min} Greater than the maximum value of {max} Must be a whole number Value is not a number
Username is required when user account is enabled Role is required when user account is enabled Account Expiry is required when user account is enabled and Current Capacity is 'Volunteer'
Cannot enable expired account. Either disable the account, clear the Account Expiry, or set Account Expiry to today or later
Island on the record must match the transfer to island
Location on the record must match the transfer to location
Channel is required. Channel 1 is required. Channel 2 is required. Time is required. Time 1 is required. Time 2 is required. Duration is required. Duration 1 is required. Duration 2 is required. Quality is required. Quality 1 is required. Quality 2 is required.
The transfer to island cannot be the same as the transfer from island
The transfer to location cannot be the same as the transfer from location
A record must have at least one observer
An observer must have at least one role
{field} is required for Egg Observation rows {rows} {field} is required Egg weights must be between 0 and 100g for rows {rows}
Heart rate must be an integer of 0 or greater for rows {rows}
{field} is required for Chick Observation rows {rows} {field} is required Chick weights must be between 0 and 5000g for rows {rows}
{field} is required for Mother Trip rows #{rows} Mother Left date/time on rows #{rows} must be on or after the Observation date/time
Mother Back date/time on rows #{rows} must be on or after the Mother Left date/time
Finish time >= Inspection time Inspection time >= Start time
{field} is required
Finish observation time must be on or after the Inspection time
Inspection time must be on or after the Observation Date/Time
Easting value supplied is not within the range specified by the Island.
Northing value supplied is not within the range specified by the Island.
If either of Easting or Northing is supplied then the other value must also be supplied.
The island entered does not exist. The island "{island}" for this location does not have any bounding values defined.
The Target Bird field is mandatory for a location of type "{locationType}".
The Target Bird selected should be the "Handraise" bird for a location of type "{locationType}".
The Clutch field is mandatory for a "{locationType}" location.
A Bird with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
A Bird with the same House ID already exists. Please choose another House ID.
A Person with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
A Person with the same username already exists. Please choose another username.
A Location with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
A Transmitter with the same id already exists. Please choose another id.
A Transmitter UHF ID must be in the range of 0 - 999. Please choose another id.
The username of "{userName}" for a Data Replication account must not contain any dots.
Test '{test}' has been repeated on rows {rows}
Chemistry assay '{chemistryAssay}' has been repeated on rows {rows}
Test '{test}' has been repeated on rows {rows}
Sperm measure '{spermMeasure}' has been repeated on rows {rows}
Date in must be on or after Date out In must be less than or equal to Out on rows {rows}
Weight must be between 0 and 5kg Heart rate must be an integer of 0 or greater
Medication checkbox must be selected if any drugs have been entered
An island with the same ID already exists. Please choose another ID.
An island with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
The island entered does not exist.
Station must begin with a type of "Hub", "Berrol", "Errol", "Nest Snark" or "Feed-out Snark".
Station format invalid. Please enter a Station type followed by a single space and a number between 0 and 255.
Activity is not relevant for detections of type '{detectionType}'. Please remove the Activity value.
Activity value is required for detections of type '{detectionTypes}'.
At least 1 female should be recorded for any mating activity'.
Relative Humidity must be between 0 and 100%
{field} must be a 4-digit number between 1001 and the current year.
A Tx Mortality with the same name already exists. Please choose another name.
